website_summaries.verdict: A great budget pick with 2 fobs that can help you find keys, pets, and more within your home/yard.
pros: Comes with 2 fobs that work on keys, wallets, kids, and pet collars
cons: Claims of tracking items miles away are often false – best within your property

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money, crappy app
customer_reviews.text: Complete waste of money, the app only works if you connect with the device while you are next to it and then leave it open indefinitely. If you close the app the device disconnects and you can't find it. I had bought this because my husband has a bad habit of accidentally taking my keys with him to work and I will waste a ton of time looking for my keys. I wanted this to tell me if my keys were in the house or not when I can't find them, and it's proven useless because I don't leave apps running and I don't always leave my location on, on my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Foss

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect but sufficient.
customer_reviews.text: I often misplace keys, and this product will solve that. The price is RIGHT. But I can't go higher than 4 stars as - A; the printing on the instruction manual is small that you need 30-20 vision to read it, and then is out of date with the current App software, and B: the device disconnects - sometimes - when in another room. But again, for < $ 10 I have solved my problem of "lost" keys that I fail to put on the key hook. I am happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Fred S. Judkins II

customer_reviews.title: This product is crap. You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: This product is crap. You get what you pay for. It’s only Bluetooth so if you get to far away (like 6 inches) it disconnects so you will not be able to find your item. DO NOT BUY!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: too good to be true
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for these, but alas, too good to be true. These connected easily to my iphone 6S initially, but then they kept disconnecting for an unknown reason, which renders them useless. I thought it was my phone but the same thing happened to my husbands phone, which is android.
customer_reviews.author: Ahl302

customer_reviews.title: Useful and light
customer_reviews.text: I bought this along with another key finder and love this better because it is really light and surely better for a key needs to be carry around every day. The green one has a weird color. But I love the black one.
customer_reviews.author: Liz_869

customer_reviews.title: Phone continued to sound off when fob was not asked to find it.
customer_reviews.text: I am sending your product back. The app was downloaded to an iphone 8. The phone continually went off playing music. The finder fob was NOT pressed to find the phone. This is not the way it should work.
customer_reviews.author: Thelma 1206

customer_reviews.title: Functionality is pretty low
customer_reviews.text: Functionality is pretty low. The app doesn't work very well at all, and is spotty as best. Best part was the two small caribiners.
customer_reviews.author: Big Steve

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: These items are awe full. Do not waste money on it. It does not work and it breaks if dropped. I accidentally dropped my keys on the tile floor at my moms house and it busted apart. It is not a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne Pecci

customer_reviews.title: Never connected, sender never responded to me
customer_reviews.text: Junk. Wouldn't ever connect properly. Asked for refund but nothing....a great idea tho! Any response Kurso company?
customer_reviews.author: Creepingtime

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't figure out how to make it work and the app is terrible. No free returns so basically just a waste of 7$
customer_reviews.author: D. Overbye

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected. Range is very small. Definately got what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: They made noise every time. They were not close to the phone
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTINA M

customer_reviews.title: 4 stars because in the end it works. Documentation ...
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars because in the end it works. Documentation is filled with awful english.....and since my two items would NOT pair to my phone it was frustrting to have to read through the gibberish 3 point text 'instructions'. In the end restarting my phone and doing the pairing a half dozen times produced a paired set and they do seem to work well for the price, time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: jcs

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: This does not work. It looses range after 3ft and keeps disconnecting and reconnecting
customer_reviews.author: kiesha

customer_reviews.title: The price is cheap because the product is cheap and useless. Returned
customer_reviews.text: Would not connect to the app after multiple tries. No customer service or troubleshooting provided. The price is cheap because the product is cheap and useless. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Athena S Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Awful product. Can’t get it to stop beeping whenever my phone is out of range.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky waters

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The problem is with the app more than the device itself. The alarm sounds constantly.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend this every time I close the app the beepers ...
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend this every time I close the app the beepers won’t stop beeping
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Desano

customer_reviews.title: Nice if they all worked
customer_reviews.text: Came in and one does not work. Not worth that hassle to return
customer_reviews.author: Robert Mueller

customer_reviews.title: Worthless. Sent them back. Key chains disconnect constantly ...
customer_reviews.text: Worthless. Sent them back. Key chains disconnect constantly, even if only a few feet away. I cannot rely on this if I ever actually did lose my keys.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew F.

customer_reviews.title: Not a great product, did not work as expected
customer_reviews.text: Only could connect 3 of the 4 we purchased. Alarm set off every time the pets went upstairs or to the backyard. Map feature does not work. Too large for a medium sized cat. Not a great product
customer_reviews.author: Emelie03

customer_reviews.title: App is junk so product is useless.
customer_reviews.text: The app loses connection / won't connect / won't sound alarm / or just freezes. I believe the device itself is ok but on both of our phones the app is junk which makes it useless.
customer_reviews.author: TCGF F.

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: So disappointing. I should have learned the last time I tried to find similar gadgets. The locator takes so much babysitting that alone will keep you from losing your keys. The locator has to be on at all times and so does the junky app that goes on your phone I stopped using it after a day. It's been a couple of weeks. It's still on my keyring but the battery is dead.
customer_reviews.author: Gregg’s Wife

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: One device failed as I took it out of the package and disappeared from the app. The other was hard to find using the lap. I am looking for an alternative. Don't go cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work consistently
customer_reviews.text: We couldn't get this to work consistently. It worked somewhat* when we set it up and tested it, but not when we really needed it (like, when we lost our keys). The app just wouldn't connect to the device, or even show it when searching for devices in the app. This would be a great thing if it just worked when it was needed, but since it didn't, then it fails to do the one thing necessary: locate my missing device.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Huff

customer_reviews.title: Spend the money on a couple of Happy meals instead!
customer_reviews.text: Well, they beeped a couple of times. But, I was only in bed playing with them and still lost the second device in bed with me! Didn’t work at all. poorly made. That was obvious right out of the box. Not only do I LOSE my keys, but I drop them, slam them in doors, get them caught on everything, and step on them all the time. These wouldn’t survive if I rolled over on them in bed. I sent them right back.
customer_reviews.author: BlueLightningJeep

customer_reviews.title: still haven't found a software which works reliably with this ...
customer_reviews.text: still haven't found a software which works reliably with this product. there is a reason why the expensive square shaped "tile" devices cost much more.
customer_reviews.author: urh

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work as advertised. Only worked within range of ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work as advertised. Only worked within range of my home WiFi and even then, it was lousy. I finally threw it away and bought a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Dancer

customer_reviews.title: Not GPS and not practical for pets
customer_reviews.text: These were awful. I bought six of them to put on a few sets of keys and some "flight risk" pets. After finding a magnifying glass in order to be able to read the instructions, I activated them and soon discovered that there is apparently no way (short of turning them off, which renders them useless) to keep the fobs from chirping every time they disconnect from the phone. I also could not get them to show up on the map in the application. This is a design and usability defect. These are not truly GPS tracking devices as alluded. They're the typical bluetooth device that only works if it's within 30 feet of the connection.
customer_reviews.author: TBLong

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work and have to keep the app open at all times to track.
customer_reviews.author: Cali408

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately continually set off the alarm on the phone so had to uninstall and return the item. Spend a little more money on a higher quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanine Blate

customer_reviews.title: Requires you to open an app to activate! Forget it.
customer_reviews.text: do not buy unless you want to have to use an app on your phone to activate. ! Yep, it's that ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Peregrine

customer_reviews.title: Good piece of gadget to keep track of things you loose frequently.
customer_reviews.text: I used to loose my tv remote but now I have this to keep track off.
customer_reviews.author: Ahsan

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: The only time I could get it to work is when I am actually holding it my hands. It unpairs very easily
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: bad no good did not work and was missing
customer_reviews.text: bad no good did not work and was missing parts
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Thank you!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughter and she hasn't lost her keys in a month! That's a record!
customer_reviews.author: RAD Creative Art

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It is absolutely useless and just beeping for a really short distance and I’m unhappy with their products
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Nice try; but no cigar.
customer_reviews.text: Works intermittently, at best. Disconnects and reconnects for no apparent reason. Has very limited range. (Actually disconnected in the same jacket pocket as the phone!) I'll salvage the batteries and small shackles. The devices go in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: bg

product_meta.title: Smart Finder Bluetooth Locator Key Pet Tracker Car Finder Child Locator Device Wireless Seeker Smart Anti Lost Alarm Sensor for Wallet Car Kids Dog Cat Bag Phone Located Selfie Shutter Pack of 2
product_meta.description:
If you always losing stuff or forget and can't find your stuff,this smart key finder will makes your life easy

1.ANTI LOST & FORGOT ALARM: Keep track of important things with ease. Simple to use, smooth app interface, loud, and durable

2.EASY TO FIND STUFF & FIND YOUR PHONE: you may always forgot where you put your stuff and can't find them,tap the calling button and Locator device alarming,easy to find your stuff,also you can press the button twice to alarm your phone and find it

3.RECORD LAST LOST LOCATION: when the device disconnect,it will record the last known location on the map,just open the app and find on the map where you lost the things

4.EASY TO SET UP & CHANGE BATTERY LOW COSTING: very easy to change the battery yourself,just buy the CR2032 battery and change,no high costing save your money

5.SELFIE VOICE RECORDING & MONEY BACK GUARANTEE: can use as a remote to make your phone taking photos and voice recording,we offer 30 days money back guarantee with no questions asking

Specifications: 

1. Bluetooth version: Bluetooth 4.0 Low Energy

2. Compatible for IOS 8.0 or above and Andrioid 4.3 or above

3. Working distance: About 75 Feet (without barrier)

4. Battery : CR2032 Lithium Coin Battery

5. Standby time: 6 Month 


Package includes:
2 Pieces Tracker Device
2 Pieces Hanging Hook

EASY TO FIND STUFF & FIND YOUR PHONE: you may always forgot where you put your stuff and can't find them,tap the calling button and Locator device alarming,easy to find your stuff,also you can press the button twice to alarm your phone and find it
